## IToolbox.setVisible() method

Sets the visibility of the toolbox.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setVisible(isVisible: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isVisible | boolean | True if toolbox should be visible. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
